onboarding1.title: Welcome to StaffGateway!
onboarding1.description: Your one-stop solution for a seamless and efficient work experience. Navigate through an intuitive interface designed to enhance your daily tasks and overall productivity.

onboarding2.title: Comprehensive Self-Services
onboarding2.description: Empower Yourself with Comprehensive Self-Services. Access a wide range of self- service tools that simplify your work life. Manage leaves, attendance, payslips, requests, approvals, permissions, and more effortlessly right from your mobile device.

onboarding3.title: Enhance Your Enterprise Operations
onboarding3.description: Take advantage of cutting-edge features that go beyond conventional boundaries. StaffGateway is here to revolutionize your user experience and transform how you handle business operations.

forget_password.title: Forget Password?
forget_password.desc: Don’t worry ! It happens. Please enter your user name,we will send the OTP to your email address

reset_confirmation.desc: Password reset successful you can be directed to the login screen now.
